thread.title: VICKI MATTICE
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by VICKI MATTICE

author: VICKI MATTICE
title: VICKI MATTICE
text:
A special thank you to Carolyn Bell of Goway Travel in Toronto whose patience and 'boots-on-the-ground' expertise ensured that I had the most amazing and enjoyable travel experiences in Australia and New Zealand.
Carolyn helped me choose budget hotels and hostels in great locations and for reasonable prices, as well as trains, buses, and local excursions that were interesting and exciting. I would highly recommend her services if you plan on travelling DOWNUNDER.
